channel.title: Guideline on An Do
channel.description: Recent content in Guideline on An Do

item.title: ChatGPT Prompts
item.description: Introduction Welcome to the “ChatGPT Prompts”! This is a collection of prompt examples to be used with the ChatGPT model. The ChatGPT model is a large language model trained by OpenAI that is capable of generating human-like text. By providing it with a prompt, it can generate responses that continue the conversation or expand on the given prompt. What is the prompt in ChatGPT? ChatGPT Prompts The “prompts” in ChatGPT refers to a sentence or a passage of text provided by the user to initiate a conversation with the system.

item.title: How to Make a Github Blog
item.description: Hi, this is my way to make a Github blog for my self, which will contain blogs, some projects, and some tips from my experience. I am a website newbie, so it took me almost 2 days to setup from start to finish, and it’s pretty easy. Here is how I made it. Initial setup Create repositories First, let take a look at what a Github Page is, and how to create one.
